Squizzy::

She was still very nervious. But this bot had treated her nicely and 
she didn't feel quite as scared with him. She slowly looked around 
inside the hanger bay.  She stood up and climbed out of Dark One.
She reached the floor and stood there looking at Dark One. "I will, 
one I get this thing out of my shoulder. Thank you." She looked 
around with fear and curiosity. "Where are we? What is this place?"
She still had the fear of what 'reprogramming' ment. 
She then had a strange thought and it send shivers up her back. "Why 
did you help me back there? What do you want me for?"

She knew she was no fighter, but her skills would be useful. But she 
couldn't figure out what a bunch of fighter would want with an 
engineer and programmer. She looked down and tried to remember her 
past. But all she could remember were partial images. But she mostly 
remembered her her training and engineering skills.  But she hated 
not knowing who she was or where she was or why she was even there.

(Basically she is a conputer geek and scientist)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Dark One::
> 
> Dark One swoops into the base, still in jet fighter mode. He flies 
down a 
> ways down a hallway before landing.
> 
> "Blast panels," he says as his cockpit opens. Blast panels drop on 
either 
> side of the hallway, closing Dark One and Squizzy in.
> 
> "You may get out," he says, "Do you need a CR chamber?"
